name: East Gwillimbury
description:
East Gwillimbury is a game about poking sea creatures for fun and profit. You take on the role of an entrepreneurial nautilus prodder with dreams to transform a barren ocean platform into a thriving city.

Poke nautili, sea turtles, and more to harvest their valuable coins.

Construct new buildings in your city to access upgrades.

Unlock powerful abilities to make even more cash.

East Gwillimbury is currently in development. Please try out the demo and let me know what you think!
